list.headline: Market Place!
list.leftTextBlock: Welcome To The Market, here you can browse all kinds of characters other members of the community created!

list.headline: Find Characters
list.leftTextBlock: Feel free to browse the market, find anything you fancy?
list.rightTextBlock: Just hit the add button and the character will be added to your character hall!

list.headline: Upload Your Creations
list.leftTextBlock: Did you make a character you want to share with the world?
list.rightTextBlock: Just hit the marketplace button in your character hall and add your character to the market!

list.headline: More Things are coming
list.leftTextBlock: I am working hard to get you new cool features
list.rightTextBlock: More additions to the marketplace are coming
